#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	
	char s1[10020],s2[10020];
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>s1>>s2;
		int i=0,f[26]={0},s[26]={0};
	    int	flag=1;
		while(s1[i]!='\0')
		{
			f[s1[i]-'A']++;
			i++;
		}
		i=0;
		
	    while(s2[i]!='\0')
		{
			s[s2[i]-'A']++;
			i++;
		}
		
		for(i=0;i<26;i++)
		{
			if(f[i]!=s[i])
			  {
			  	flag=0;
			  	break;
			  
			  }
		}
		
		if(flag==1)
		  cout<<"YES"<<endl;
		else
		   cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		
	}
	return 0;
}
